mapper.insert: insert region(id, name, status, organization_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{status}, #{organizationId});
mapper.select: select a.* from region as a left join lamp_region as b on b.region_id = a.id left join lamp as c on c.id = b.lamp_id where c.id = #{id}
select * from region where id = #{_parameter};
select * from region where name = #{_parameter};
select * from region where id = #{regionId} and organization_id = #{organId}
select * from region;
select * from region limit 1;
select * from region limit #{_parameter};

select distinct a.*, c.latitude, c.longitude from region as a left join lamp_region as b on b.region_id = a.id left join lamp as c on c.id = b.lamp_id where c.status = 0 and a.status = 0 and a.organization_id = #{organId};
select id as regionId, name as regionName from region where organization_id = #{organId};
select c.* from region as a left join lamp_region as b on b.region_id = a.id left join lamp as c on c.id = b.lamp_id where a.id = #{regionId};

select c.* from region as a left join electricity_disposition_box_region as b on b.region_id = a.id left join electricity_disposition_box as c on c.id = b.electricity_disposition_box_id where a.id = #{id};

select c.device_id as deviceId, c.device_name as deviceName, MAX(IF(d.name = '北斗经度', value, 0)) AS 'longitude', MAX(IF(d.name = '北斗纬度', value, 0)) AS 'latitude' from region as a left join lamp_region as b on b.region_id = a.id left join lamp as c on c.id = b.lamp_id left join data_location as d on d.device_id = c.device_id where c.status = 0 and a.status = 0 and a.id = #{regionId} group by c.device_id, c.device_name;

select c.device_id, c.device_name from region as a left join lamp_region as b on b.region_id = a.id left join lamp as c on c.id = b.lamp_id where a.organization_id = #{organId} and c.environment = true

select c.device_id, c.device_name from region as a left join lamp_region as b on b.region_id = a.id left join lamp as c on c.id = b.lamp_id where a.organization_id = #{organId} and a.id = #{regionId} and c.status != #{status};
select c.* from region as a left join lamp_region as b on b.region_id = a.id left join lamp as c on c.id = b.lamp_id where a.organization_id = #{organId} and a.id = #{regionId};

select c.* from region as a left join electricity_disposition_box_region as b on b.region_id = a.id left join electricity_disposition_box as c on c.id = b.electricity_disposition_box_id where a.organization_id = #{organId} and a.id = #{regionId};

select name, round(avg(value), 2) as value, max(at) as at from data_environment where device_id = #{deviceId} and at between date_sub(date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), interval 1 day ) and date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') group by name;

select name, round(avg(value), 2) as value, max(at) as at from data_environment where device_id = #{deviceId} and at between date_sub(date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), interval #{hours} hour) and date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') group by name;

select name, round(avg(value), 2) as value, max(at) as at from data_environment where device_id = #{deviceId} and at between date_sub(date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00'), interval 1 hour) and date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') group by name;

select name, round(avg(value), 2) as value, max(at) as at from data_environment where device_id = #{deviceId} and at between date_sub(date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00'), interval #{hours} hour) and date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') group by name;

select name, round(avg(value), 2) as value, date_format(at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') as at from data_environment where name = #{name} and device_id = #{deviceId} and date_format(at,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_sub(date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day) group by date_format(at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') order by date_format(at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') desc limit 24;

select name, round(avg(value), 2) as value, date_format(at,'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') as at from data_environment where name = #{name} and device_id = #{deviceId} and at < date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') group by date_format(at,'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') order by date_format(at,'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') desc limit 30;

select name, round(avg(value), 2) as value, date_format(at,'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') as at from data_environment where name = #{name} and device_id = #{deviceId} and date_format(at,'%Y-%m') >= date_sub(date_format(now(),'%Y-%m'), interval 1 year) group by date_format(at,'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') order by date_format(at,'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') desc limit 12;
select 1 from region as a left join RBAC_V2.organization as b on a.organization_id = b.id left join RBAC_V2.user as c on c.organization_id = b.id where c.id = #{userId} and a.id = #{regionId};
